text: I absolutely love this course! The instructor explains concepts so clearly and the examples are really helpful. I feel like I'm finally understanding programming.
I'm really struggling with the recursion homework. It's way too difficult and I don't understand it at all. I've spent hours and still can't figure it out.
I'm thinking about dropping this class. The workload is overwhelming and I can't keep up. I'm stressed and anxious all the time.
The homework assignments are really helpful for practice, but they take a lot of time to complete. Maybe reduce the number of problems?
When is the final exam scheduled? I need to know so I can plan my study schedule accordingly.
The lab sessions are fantastic! The TAs are patient and really help us understand the material hands-on.
I'm confused about classes and objects. The lecture went too fast and I couldn't follow along.
This is my favorite class this semester! I look forward to every lecture and lab.
The upload system for assignments keeps crashing. I tried submitting my homework three times and it failed each time. Very frustrating!
I wish there were more office hours available. The current schedule doesn't work with my other classes.
The pace of the course is perfect. Not too fast, not too slow. I'm learning a lot!
Recursion is so confusing! Can we have more examples and practice problems? I really want to understand this.
I don't think I can pass this class. Everything is too hard and I'm falling behind. I feel like giving up.
The textbook is excellent! Very clear explanations and good exercises.
Can we slow down the lectures a bit? I'm taking notes but missing important parts because we move so quickly.
The data structures assignment was challenging but fair. Really enjoyed working on it!
I'm still struggling with the homework. Even after attending office hours, I'm confused.
What are the prerequisites for the advanced course? I want to take it next semester.
The study guide for the midterm was really helpful. Thank you!
I'm having trouble with proofs. They don't make sense to me at all.
